entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 6 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10 except minus 6 near the Alberta border. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5 except plus 1 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5 except plus 1 near the Alberta border. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
